name: 陳美琇
objective:
使同學瞭解經濟學的基本觀念及理論，並可利用其作時事議題分析之工具。
主要以個體經濟學的議題為主，包括(1) 供給、需求及供需均衡 (2)彈性的意義，(3)市場效率與公共政策，(4) 消費者及生產者行為等議題之討論

This course is an introductory course of Economics. The major goal is to help students understand the basic principles and theories of Economics, and therefore have a better understanding of how the economy works as a whole, and the potential and limits of economic policies. The major topics include the following: (1)supply, demand, and equilibrium, (2) elasticity, (3) market efficiency and public policy, and (4) consumer and producer behavior.
schedule:
1. Introduction(簡介)
2. Principles of Economics(經濟學原理)
3. Thinking like an Economist(經濟學家之思維)
4. Principles of Comparative Advantages(比較利益原則)
5. Gains from Trade(交易互惠)
6. Demand and Supply(需求與供給)
7. Market Equilibrium(市場均衡)
8. Supply, Demand, and Government Policies(供給、需求與政府政策)
9. Midterm Exam(期中考)
10. The Elasticity of Demand(需求彈性)
11. The Elasticity of Supply(供給彈性)
12. Applications of Supply, Demand, and Elasticity(供給、需求與彈性之應用)
13. Consumer Surplus and Producer Surplus(消費者剩餘與生產者剩餘)
14. Market Efficiency and Market Failure(市場效率與市場失靈)
15. Deadweight Loss of Taxation(無謂損失)
16. Deadweight Loss of Tariff and Import Quotas(關稅與進口配額)
17. Market Equilibrium and Efficiency(市場均衡與效率)
18. Final Exam(期末考)
